task: Cutting an Apple with a Sharp Knife

steps.description: Place the apple on a stable, flat surface, such as a cutting board.
Hold the knife firmly with the dominant hand, ensuring a secure grip on the handle.
Position the knife over the apple, aligning the blade with the desired cutting line or the middle of the apple.
Begin cutting by applying downward pressure with the knife, guiding it through the apple.
Continue applying steady pressure, moving the knife through the apple to complete the cut.
Lift the knife away from the apple once the cut is complete, ensuring the apple pieces remain intact.
Inspect the cut apple to ensure it was done evenly and without excessive pressure.

action_roles.description: The person performing the cutting task, responsible for holding the knife and applying pressure.
The sharp knife used to cut the apple.
The apple, which is being cut into pieces.
The cutting board or stable surface that supports the apple during the cutting process.
The sliced apple pieces after the knife has cut through the object.
